entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , McBride
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:41 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Snow mixed with rain beginning early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
